page.title: 15Aboyne Highland Games
page.content: The Aboyne Highland Games is an annual event held on the first weekend of August each year. The event takes place on the local green situated in the centre of Aboyne and is a great social gathering with people from all around the area coming to watch and take part. The Games have been held for many years and are the main event in Aboyne's social calendar. The {events}include{traditional sports}such as tossing the caber and the hill race. There is provision for organisations to set up stalls around the area and many people take advantage of this for fund raising. The shops get good{trade}on the day but the overall effect is minimal. The main{entertainment}is the marquee dance and disco held in the evening and the Fair that takes place on the Friday night and during Saturday.
